detail_desc: Chino shorts in airy cotton seersucker with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt pocket with a button at the back.
Long, wrapover skirt in a crêpe weave with a press-stud fastening at the waist, tie at the hips and flounced hem. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short sleeves with a slit and ties. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Short lace skirt with a concealed zip in the side and box pleats. Lined.
Shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a collar and button placket.

Tailored trousers in a stretch weave with an elasticated waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Zipped side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with decorative seams and a slit at the hems.

Knee-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a frilled collar, ties at the front and long puff sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Buttons down the front, a drawstring at the waist and seam with wide flounce at the hem. V-neck underdress in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Long, jumper in a hole-patterned knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with an opening at the back, decorative ties at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck and tie detail at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce on the shoulders and at the cuffs. An elasticated seam at the waist, and a flounce at the hem.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in washed superstretch twill with a regular waist and skinny legs.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood and small appliqué at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets and a contrasting-colour jersey trim around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined top section.
Straight-cut jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and long sleeves. No fasteners. Unlined.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Padded, oversized jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip and long sleeves with narrow ribbed elastication at the cuffs. Lined. The filling is made from recycled polyester.

Straight-cut blouse in taffeta with flounces down the front, back and sleeves. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and long balloon sleeves with gathers at the shoulders to create a puff effect, and narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a decorative scalloped trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, a seam at the waist with a bow, and a glittery tulle skirt.
Fitted, turtleneck top in airy jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a smocked bodice and wide, tie-top shoulder straps. Gathered seam on the skirt for added width. Unlined.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Underwired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), a narrow trim around the neckline and flutter sleeves with overlocked edges.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbing at the cuffs.

Lined, ribbed bikini top with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable, elastic shoulder straps and matching elastic between the cups. Metal fastener at the back.
Sarong in an airy, patterned silk and Tencel™ lyocell weave.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter from 3 cm to 4.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in airy, softly draping jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs with creases.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. A pair of clip earrings made partly from recycled metal. The earrings are decorated with thin chain pendants and beads made partly from recycled glass. Length approx. 3 cm, with pendants 5.5 cm.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy linen and viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons at the top. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative tab and button, and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, side pockets and welt back pockets. Elasticated seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt at the front, belt loops with a decorative button, and straight, gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with pointed toes and open sides. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane soles.
Metal rings in various designs.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in sturdy denim with a high waist and V-shaped seam front and back. Zip fly and button and tapered legs with a seam at the front.
Plastic hair claw. Width 4.5 cm.

Knee-length dress in a soft viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and short sleeves with flounced trims. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with lace sections, a V-neck and straight-cut hem.
Court shoes with pointed toes and crossover straps at the top with a metal buckle at one side. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 10.5 cm.
Top in light sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, wide puff sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a rolled, raw-edge hem.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button, and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit.

Set with a jacket, pair of joggers and T-shirt. Jacket in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with notch lapels, buttons at the front and side pockets. Unlined. Jersey joggers in a cotton blend with a fake fly, elasticated waist with a button and side pockets. T-shirt in cotton jersey with buttons on one shoulder and a chest pocket in woven fabric.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button at the waist, and skinny legs.
Hair elastic with plastic beads.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned thermal fleece with press-studs down the front that continue down one leg.

Short dress in a lustrous weave with a V-neck and wrapover at the top with a concealed press-stud. Opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck, long cuffed sleeves with a slit running down, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Jersey tops in soft cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short, fitted coat in woven fabric with a brushed finish. Stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, a seam at the waist and side pockets with a concealed zip. Lined.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-shaped opening at the front, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with an elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves,a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
Sandals in imitation patent leather with adjustable straps with a metal buckle. Moulded soles that are fluted underneath. Platform 3 cm.
Push-up bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Large paper straw hat with a partly sewn-in rolled-up section on the brim. Width of brim 21 cm.
Short sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves, a wrapover opening at the back and ties at the hem.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch cotton blend with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Trainers with chunky, patterned soles and sections in imitation leather, imitation suede and mesh. Padded top edge, a tongue and lacing at the front. Piqué linings and insoles. Some of the polyester content of the trainers is recycled.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
Jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, V-neck, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
